Package kademlia.dht

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    KadContent
    Any piece of content that needs to be stored on the DHT
    KademliaDHT
    The main Distributed Hash Table interface that manages the entire DHT
    KademliaStorageEntry
    A StorageEntry interface for the storage entry class used to store a content on the DHT
    KademliaStorageEntryMetadata
    Keeps track of data for a Content stored in the DHT Used by the StorageEntryManager class
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    DHT
    The main Distributed Hash Table class that manages the entire DHT
    GetParameter
    A GET request can get content based on Key, Owner, Type, etc This is a class containing the parameters to be passed in a GET request We use a class since the number of filtering parameters can change later
    JKademliaStorageEntry
    A JKademliaStorageEntry class that is used to store a content on the DHT
    StorageEntryMetadata
    Keeps track of data for a Content stored in the DHT Used by the StorageEntryManager class
